inn1.comm: hint of swing straight away, shapes away from Cook who defends into the off side
back of a length, pushed off the back foot into the covers
behind the line and defended

gone! India strike early. Cook won't believe he's done that, it was short and wide but the England captain picked out backward point with a cut. Good catch above his head by Jadeja, early problems for the visitors
ooh, big shout for lbw first ball as this nips back into Trott but he'd managed to get half forward and it was too high
outside off and left alone...terrific first over for India
wide outside off, nips away off the pitch and Kieswetter shoulders arms
good delivery, closer to off stump and it beats the outside edge as it swings away
this one doesn't swing, catches Kieswetter on the crease and takes him high on the pad
good length outside off and left alone
and another! England in a mess, Kieswetter pushes hard outside off at a good-length delivery and sends a regulation outside edge towards the lone slip and it's neatly taken
beaten! Almost a third as Pietersen feels at his first delivery, no footwork, playing away from his body and it goes past the outside edge
good line outside off, hints to come back into Trott but he's able to leave alone
it's a run! A whole run. Trott opens the face and gets a single towards backward point
full outside off, swinging away and left alone
dragged down short and a touch wider but Pietersen decides not to have a dart
wide outside off again, trying to draw Pietersen into a drive but he resists so far
this one is too wide and he'll need to bowl it again
back closer to off stump, Pietersen watches it go through once again
pitched up outside off, less swing for Vinay, and Trott raises his bat out of the line
bat on ball as Trott stands tall in the crease and defends from off stump into the covers
comes onto the front foot, defended square into the off side
on off stump, Trott goes across his crease and pushed to mid-off
runs off the face towards the gully area and they steal a single as Pietersen makes a quick call
not much carry on this as it's left alone and Dhoni takes it by his bootlaces
finally England find the boundary, Trott was offered some width but he also used his feet then drove on the up through the covers
back-to-back boundaries, Praveen loses his line down the leg side and it's neatly flicked down to fine leg
make that three in a row, good intent from Trott as he makes a big stride forward then drives square through backward point
ooh! Looking for another attacking stroke and almost edges through to Dhoni. Praveen had dragged his length back and Trott played away from his body
runs off a thick outer half of the bat down to third man
now Pietersen gets a boundary, steps across the crease and whips it away from around off stump through backward square leg
hint of width but Trott doesn't connect properly as he jabs into the off side
tight to off stump and defended into the leg side
good line and solid defence, Trott behind the line with a perfectly straight bat
direct hit would have been close! Trott pushed into the off side towards mid-off and set off straight, Raina was swiftly in from cover but missed with an underarm flick
decent carry as Pietersen shoulders arms
defended into the leg side
nicely bowled, late movement back into Trott who is taken on the pad
guided away through backward point, good running puts pressure on third man and Yadav fumbles near the boundary
this time the swing into Trott takes it down the leg side, flicks the pad and goes wide of the keeper
that's more like it, pitched up outside off, Trott comes onto the front foot and defends
driven up to the mid-off
well-timed off his pads - in fact, it was a pretty straight delivery - but straight to midwicket
worked away from off stump by Pietersen wide of midwicket
back of a length, sweetly punched to mid-off
pitched up, driven to the right of mid-off without much timing and despite a stretch Pietersen was well home - unlike the opening match
lovely shot, that's Trott at his best as he leans into a half volley and threads the gap between point and cover
now he drives with good timing to mid-off...most things are coming off the middle for Trott so far
this wasn't a half volley, he drives on the up but straight to a fairly short point
driven firmly off the back foot towards mid-off who is deep enough to allow a sharp single
as there an edge? Trott went for cut and Dhoni couldn't gather. Don't think he touched it
punched firmly to short cover
can't take advantage of some width, he went to cut but it came off the bottom edge and rolled towards slip
takes the bottom hand off the bat as he drives into the covers
clipped away beautifully from around off stump and it whistled through midwicket...barely any effort, all timing
for this over Dhoni is stood back, so Pietersen can walk across the crease and down the pitch then he flicks to mid-on
more superb timing and placement from Trott as he drives through the covers...no issues with his strike-rate today
pushed back down the pitch to the bowler
back of a length, whipped off the stumps and the outfield is very quick. The fielder was kept interested but couldn't quite flick it back
seems harder to time on this pitch when the ball is back of a length and Trott punches back to the bowler
breakthrough! Just as England were fighting back Trott feels outside off stump and gets a simple edge through to Dhoni. Nice line from Vinay, but slightly lazy from Trott after such a good start
he lobs one up full and wide outside off to start, and is firmly driven to cover
pitched right up again, and the drive is stopped at cover
even slower through the air from Kohli, and KP dabs to gully
cracked on the up to extra cover
finally the single comes, Pietersen's drive threading the gap in the covers before being hauled in by the sweeper
full and straight from Kohli, Bopara defends with bat and pad firmly together
nicely full from Vinay Kumar, who stoops in his follow through to palm Pietersen's drive to mid-off
Pietersen walks right across to off stumps and flicks off the pad, the ball rolling out to deep square
well, there's an enthusiastic appeal as this one keeps a little low ... But that's come off the face of the bat
a good testing line outside off from Vinay Kumar, who's still getting the ball to seam away from the right-handers
pitched right up outside off, Bopara feeling a little for the ball as he stretches out to defend to point
Ravi is off the mark, nudging a single through square leg
a slow-medium delivery outside off is tapped to extra cover
a very slow offcutter sits up in the pitch and is tapped hard back to the bowler
another offcutter, and it's turned with the spin towards midwicket
full and straight, and Bopara comes forward to defend
chopped down just behind square for a single
KP stands tall at the crease and slams a length delivery to wide mid-off
a rising length delivery is pushed firmly to point
once again Bopara cracks the ball behind square, this time the placement is superb and he beats both backward point and third man to pick up four
the bowler responds by going fuller and straighter, and a defensive prod rolls to mid-off
straighter still from Vinay Kumar. Bopara steps across and attempts to work to leg, but finds the man at midwicket
pitched up and shaping gently away outside off. Bopara steps to the pitch and gets a good connection on the drive, sending the ball rolling out to deep cover
exaggerated seam movement! This was a cracking delivery. It went like a legbreak off the pitch and Pietersen, who was pressing half forward, was well and truly beaten
full and wide outside off, Bopara collects a single with a flashing square drive
a low, dipping full toss is squeezed down to short third man, where Parthiv makes a tumbling stop and parries the ball to Jadeja, who had run round from point
full and straight, tapped into the off side
Kohli cuts a slow delivery in off the pitch and Bopara, who stayed deep in the crease, can only push it back to the bowler
a touch too straight from Kohli, and he's eased through midwicket for a single
punched to mid-on off the front foot
and he's slammed to straight midwicket first ball! It wasn't the greatest delivery, a long hop that sat up and asked to be hit. Bopara obliged, nailing the pull
much better! Yadav bent his back this time and pitched it on a good length, beating the outside edge of Bopara's poke. Good carry through to Dhoni too
shot! Bopara steps forward and caresses a cover drive through cover point. Great timing on the shot, he didn't try to over-hit it at all
well, this over has been a real mixed bag. After that great shot Bopara stands still at the crease and attempts a flat-footed pull, missing the ball completely
the fastest ball of the day so far. It's full of length and pushed defensively to cover

Yadav has been a little all over the place in this over. Now he attempts a bouncer but there's no help off the pitch and Bopara doesn't bother trying to keep his pull down, collecting four at deep square
he starts with a regulation offspinner that is flicked in front of square on the leg side
flighted on off stump. Ashwin gets some grip off the surface, Ravi defending the offspinner towards midwicket
Ashwin continues to keep things tight, Bopara defending to leg
driven down to long on for an ambled single

this looked pretty close! Pietersen went right across to off and bent down to sweep, but the ball fizzed past the bat and appeared to strike him on the pad. Perhaps there was some glove or bat on it? Either way, the umpire wasn't the least bit interested
that's what he was trying to do! Again Pietersen bends low to sweep and moves across to off stump, but this time he gets a good connection and a diving fielder at fine leg can't stop the boundary
flighted up on off stump from round the wicket, tapped to point
Bopara hangs back in the crease and pushes defensively square of the wicket
a little too short from Jadeja, Bopara sends the ball forcefully out to deep cover where Vinay Kumar fumbles and allows them back for the second
that's the length! A little fuller from Jadeja, Bopara is drawn forward and the ball takes a thick edge, rolling to third man
almost caught-and-bowled! Pietersen came forward without much certainty and pushed at the ball, which lobbed back towards Jadeja. The bowler leapt forward but couldn't quite get to it
after the drama KP completes the over by defending to cover point
the ball spins in slightly to Bopara, who defends to leg
Bopara steps back into his crease and aims a checked drive down to long on for a single
flicked off the pad to square leg
Ashwin trundles to the crease and does a little stop-start before releasing the ball, but it's safely negotiated by a defensive Pietersen
pushed wide of mid-on for one
swept hard out to deep square leg, where there is protection on the boundary
Pietersen skips down the track, getting to the pitch and nurdling to leg for one
watchfully played by Bopara, who waits for the spin and chops behind square
probing stuff from Jadeja, but again Bopara is very cautious and defends right under his eyes
pushed defensively into the covers
this lands a little too wide of off, and Bopara steps forward to drive to deep cover
this one keeps a little low, but KP keeps his eye on it and taps back to the bowler
big turn for Ashwin, grips outside off and cramps Bopara
touch too straight, worked off the hip to square leg
tries to use his feet, but this is a touch flat so he just bunts it along the ground to long on
outside off stump, Bopara onto the front foot and opens the face
driven to cover
pushed in full and eased down the ground
comes forward and pushes into the off side
worked from outside off down to long on
careful Ravi...he pushes into the off side then takes a wander up the pitch
driven firmly and with a bit of flourish through the off side
that's good from KP...an emphatic lofted straight drive clear comes out of the middle and takes England to 100
he repeats the dose! Now Pietersen is ticking. Uses his feet again and launches Jadeja straight down the ground
worked into the gap at midwicket
strides forward, waits a fraction longer as the balls a touch slower then pushes down the ground
round the wicket, outside leg stump and Bopara finds midwicket
on off stump, Bopara comes forward with head over the ball and defends
dragged down short outside leg stump, pulled away put without ideal placement to deep square
nearly a run out! It's on the cards between these two. Pietersen works it around the corner to short fine leg and is slow to respond to Bopara's call. KP dives in and the throw misses
starts well, full on off stump, Pietersen pushes and runs as it goes to mid-on
wide full toss and Bopara misses out as he drives straight to the cover sweeper
goes full, searching for a hint of movement back into Pietersen, and it's pushed to mid-on
well bowled! Beats Pietersen outside off stump, that had pace and KP pushed without much footwork
pitches up this time, outside off, Pietersen drives down to long off
short outside off stump, Bopara opts for the pull but it's a bit too wide for the shot and he gets a toe-end back towards the bowler
stays round the wicket, pushes with an open face into the off side
nudged into the leg side
delicate from Pietersen, waits a touch longer then opens the face to glide it through the vacant slip area
worked down the ground to long on
gone! The partnership ends. Turns nicely from middle and leg to straighten on Bopara who hasn't got much of a stride in and Billy Bowden quickly raises the finger
he's tested first ball, lunges forward at a delivery that turns and defends awkwardly
back of a length, Pietersen hops into line and pushes into the leg side

huge wicket! Two quick strikes. How quickly the game can change. Pietersen drives at a wide delivery and gets a thin edge through to Dhoni who takes an excellent catch close to the ground. The umpires check with TV that it carried and it's fine
beaten first ball! Tentative push outside off and it scoots past the outside edge
banged in short, Patel drops his hands and lets it go through
defended into the off side
plays the pull and this short delivery and doesn't get much timing to midwicket
attacking line outside off, Patel comes forward and defends
hint of turn takes the inside edge as Patel pushes forward but the ball goes down
full on off stump, easily worked down to long on
full outside off, driven square through the off side to the sweeper
stays on the crease, defends to midwicket
skips onto the back foot and works this out to deep midwicket
loose shot, flays away from his body, he was trying to cut but without much conviction and beaten by extra bounce
short and wide, Patel connects this time out to deep cover
outside off, a hint of shape away, Bairstow watches it go past
nice drive from Bairstow, leans into the shot but the cover sweeper is quickly round
now he plays the pull as Yadav drops short, deep square-leg in action this time
driven firmly to extra cover
continues round the wicket, on off stump, defended into the off side
quicker ball on leg stump is turned to midwicket
pushed wider across the batsman and it's defended into the covers
well bowled, tried to use his feet but it was a quicker ball and he was hurried into a defence shot which nearly sent an edge to short leg
takes the outside edge through short third man...Bairstow not entirely comfortable
well-timed down the ground to long on
back of a length outside off, punched firmly to cover
dragged wide outside off, Bairstow gets half way through chasing it then tries to pull out of the shot

excellent short ball but he concedes a boundary. Bairstow got into a tangle playing the pull, and finished on his backside, but still timed it well enough while the fine-leg fielder palmed it over the boundary
very wide outside off, Yadav striving for some extra pace
defended into the leg side
a half volley is sweetly driven straight to mid-off
opens the face a touch on this drive which sends the ball to the left of mid-off
on leg stump, tucked around the corner
solid line and length, defended with a pendulum-straight bat
forward and blocked stoutly
clipped off the toes, but straight to midwicket
misdirected
forward and defended with an angled bat
a punched drive to mid-off, half-stopped, and they opt out of the single
a half appeal for lbw as that one nips off the seam. but always too high
another off-cutter, takes the inside edge and they scamper a quick single with the ball in the popping crease
clobbered into the covers, but can't pierce the field
an uppish drive through a vacant third slip.
solidly blocked to mid-on
full and straight, dug out back to the bowler
on a good length, defended
read the length earlier, a shimmy down the track and a full-blooded wallop into the sightscreen. Shot
biffed into the covers
can't beat the field
chopped into the deep, where Raina is wrongfooted by a slight deflection off silly point
a tidy end to the over
cut firmly, but expertly stopped by a diving point
deflected to backward point where Jadeja has an easier gather this time
open-faced steer into the gully
poked defence, back down the track
deflected out to midwicket, casual accumulation
uneasy defence, very nearly popped a return catch to the bowler
outside off, in the channel, beats an attempted back-cut
poked on the up to deep cover
outside off, beats the edge again. Excellent line and length
clipped to midwicket, full and straight
defended out to point
pushed out to long-on
on the hip, tucked to fine leg
deflected to midwicket
way down the leg side. That'll help
good riposte, a sharp spinner that cut across Samit's bows
finds the gap
advancing, but can't make room for the shot
struck on the pad outside leg stump. A tight over
in the blockhole, drilled to mid-on
down the legside
firmly struck to mid-off
battered, baseball-style, back over the bowler's head. Not got the legs to go for four, but it requires a run and a slide to intercept
good yorker, well played. Tapped to short cover for a single
thought about a quick single to square leg but was quickly persuaded otherwise! The shy went wide
in the blockhole again, nothing to do but drive back to the bowler. Exceptional Powerplay bowling
chopped through point, and this time it beats the field
quicker ball, pushed through and deflected to mid-on
tucked off the toes, England keeping it simple for the moment
there's the big shot, and it's well played. Down the track, open face, lofted over extra cover. Good strike
down the leg side
flicked to midwicket
thrashed into the covers, can't beat the field
driven down the ground for a single
on the pads, flicked away
yorker length, deflected to third man
patted out to deep midwicket, finds space
turned off the toes, slow but steady accumulation
deflected through third man
in the slot and battered! Down on one knee, and into the stands at midwicket
cracked into the covers, but intercepted
on the pads, tucked into space
a big appeal as Bairstow sweeps, but the umpire isn't fooled and gives the wide
on the pads, flicked into space, a decent over for England
not a great start! Short, wide, and slapped powerfully through cover point for four
an offcutter is flicked to leg for one
pushed firmly down the ground, long-off rushing in to keep them to one
full outside off, and eased through wide mid-off
tapped away, the call for the single is immediate but this is very tight! Bairstow really needed to get his legs moving as he charged across, a direct hit from mid-on finding him safely home
nudged away for a slightly less dramatic single
chipped powerfully down to long-off. The ball never got up too high, and fell well short of the fielder
superb timing! Yadav steamed in and aimed for the yorker, but Bairstow just stayed deep in the crease and jabbed down on it, the ball pinging out of the middle and racing to deep midwicket

ah, that is a horrid delivery, sprayed really wide by Yadav, and Dhoni had to stretch to stop it. In fact, he couldn't cut the ball off cleanly and is struck a painful blow on the ends of the fingers of his right hand
Raina! The ball was chopped hard to cover and it looked like runs were a certainty ... until Raina leapt athletically to his left to cut it off. He's exemplary in the field
another very wide delivery outside off, Yadav losing his radar a little here

gone! Yadav's scattergun approach has proved effective. This one pitched short of a good length, Patel moving back to play it, but kept really low and struck him plumb in front. A promising stand is broken, and India move into the ascendancy once more
Yadav hits a length, aiming straight, and Bresnan defends
squirted off the outer half of the bat, the ball flying through gully and down to third man. Not the most convincing way to get off the mark, but they all count
punched down the ground for one
Bairstow comes forward and places the ball through mid-on
Bresnan drives with his weight forward, but can't find any timing or placement
Bresnan is back this time - a little dangerously - but does well enough, waiting for the spin and nurdling one to cover
Bairstow comes down the track with a fleet-footed shuffle, but can't get to the pitch and defends

caught at long off! Again Bairstow used his feet, but this time he went through with the stroke. He sliced under it just a little, however, and Kohli was the man waiting under the ball as it plummeted down short of the boundary. That's actually a really good catch, he wasn't far from the rope but judged it well. Good all-round cricketer, this Kohli ...
Swann props half forward to his first delivery, presenting the full face of the bat

ramped over slip! Yadav pitched one a little short and Swann jabbed at it with an angled bat, lifting it over the leaping slip fielder. He surely wasn't trying to play it that fine, but it's a pretty good shot all the same. Adventurous
beaten, on the drive, outside off. The ball, a full one, shaped nicely away from Swann as he came forward
full once more from Yadav, this time Swann lays bat on the drive to send the ball to deep cover
Ah, Kohli! After that brilliant catch, he's tumbled over one at deep midwicket and allowed it through for four
top-edged ... and safe! Yadav sent down a fiery bouncer which hurried Bresnan's pull, taking the edge of the bat and looping down to third man but falling in front of the fielder
good placement from Bresnan. He aimed for the gap at wide long on, and though he didn't hit it well enough to get four he picks up two before the fielder can get across
some grip off the surface! Jadeja floated this one down quite slowly, the ball landing on leg and spinning across Bresnan, squaring up his defensive push
tapped just wide of midwicket for a single
and Swann follows suit, working with the round-the-wicket angle to pick up a single on the leg side
an attacking sweep from Bresnan, who gets a good connection and keeps it down but picks out the man at deep square
canny bowling! Jadeja spotted Bresnan charging out and speared in a quicker one at his toes to draw a hurried jab from the batsman

off stump cartwheels! Kumar has struck straight away, picking up his third wicket with a length delivery that kept just a shade low to beat Swann's attempted glide to third man, crashing into the top of off stump. England are in serious danger of being bowled out short of their 50 overs.
Kumar attacks the stumps again with a nicely full, straight delivery. Finn's defence is good enough to keep it out
sliding down leg? There's an emotive appeal from Kumar as he raps Finn's pads with one that does a little off the seam. The umpire is unmoved, however, and that looked to be going down the leg side
dug in short on off stump. The tall Finn gets up to ride the bounce and angles it down to third man
speared at middle and leg again, and Bresnan misses with the flick. There's no appeal this time, the ball clearly going down
the attempted bouncer goes awry, going down the leg side

an easy catch for Raina! Bresnan tried to loft a full delivery down the ground but didn't come close to timing it, scooping the ball tamely towards deep mid-off, where an unflustered Raina leapt to pluck it out of the air. There goes another one!
good intent from Yadav, hurling one down full and straight. It hits the pad, but the angle was taking it down leg
tapped cautiously to midwicket, where Gambhir tumbles over in his attempt to stop the ball, allowing a scampered single

close! A full delivery was dropped close in on the off side and Finn wanted the single, but Jadeja sprinted in from point and under-armed the ball straight into the stumps. Finn had to get the dive out ... and it's fortunate he did so, as it's saved him!
arrowed in at Finn's toes, but he manages to get the bat down just in time to keep it out
and again! Superb yorker from Yadav, and the inside edge of Finn's bat saves his stumps
just short of a length on middle, the ball is tucked off the hip to leg ... and they take a single courtesy of a wild return throw from the fielder
the ball takes a healthy outside edge of a poking bat and bounces towards backward point
nice length from Kumar, and the batsman is neither forward nor back as he presents a defensive bat
just a little short of that good length, and Finn is able to hang back and work a single wide of midwicket
and now Kumar sends down the yorker! He doesn't quite have the same pace as Yadav, however, and is kept out easily enough
a hint of width is offered outside off, but and a firm push to cover brings a single
Dernbach looks a little clueless as he swishes at this length delivery, the ball taking the inside edge and thudding into his pad. Still, he survives!
chipped in the air on the leg side, but hitting the ground well short of the long on fielder

silly running! The ball was flicked to leg and there was certainly an easy single on offer. Dernbach certainly thought it was only one, he ran past the stumps at the non-striker's end, but Finn was set on a second run. A total communication breakdown, and even as Dernbach set off in the vain hope of reaching the striker's end before the ball, Finn was turning around with the same idea. Needless to say, Dernbach is easily run out and England are out for 237

inn2.comm: good start, full on off stump, defended into the covers
driven off the back foot square to backward point
back of a length, Patel punches down the off side of the pitch and mid-off is quite wide...as Pietersen dives he rolls on the ball. Always a drama with KP
adjusts quickly to the right hander, good length on off stump, defended to the off side
gets into line then punches out to the covers
touch fuller to end the over but Rahane again defends on the back foot
wrong line to start with on leg stump but he gets away with it as Patel flicks it one bounce to long leg
good pace from Finn, Rahane opens the face and beats a diving backward point
well bowled, nips back at Patel and takes an inside edge into the pads
defended out to midwicket
lovely shot, wasn't too bad a ball but Patel punched it off the back foot between cover and backward point
plays across the line and works this from middle stump to square leg
very full, almost yorker-length, and it's dug out to the covers
drifting into the pads, takes the pads to long leg. There was half an appeal from Bresnan but no support from behind the stumps
superb timing, Patel stays deep in his crease and punches a back-of-a-length delivery through midwicket and despite a strong chase by Cook it reaches the boundary
the bowler makes sure he doesn't get too straight, this is outside off and doesn't bounce much which means Patel chops it off a bottom edge
dropped Patel fends at this outside off, sends an edge to the left of Swann at second slip but he can't hold on with a dive. England dropped an early catch in the previous game, too
pushed into the off side and despite a dive at cover they get home
full on middle and off, Patel doesn't really get forward and defends to backward point
huge appeal for lbw! It pitched well outside leg stump so a good decision. Patel tried to play across the line and Finn got very excited
driven awkwardly up to mid-off, Finn has found a good length
short ball, Patel doesn't connect cleanly with his pull
driven off the back foot into the covers
good length at off stump, defended to the leg side
England strike! Patel has chipped a catch to mid-on where Cook has taken a good catch above his head. It was quite a full delivery around leg stump and it didn't quite come out of the middle
he's greeted by a bouncer first ball, he drops his hands and lets it go over off stump
pitched up on middle and off, defended to the off side
he plays at this one, defends to the off side
driven sweetly to mid-off
pushed firmly square on the off
rides a touch of extra bounce and works it down to long leg
pushed across the left hander and left alone
very full, dug out towards mid-off and they take a sharp single. The throw misses and he would have made it anyway
worked off the stumps to midwicket
testing line outside off, but it's well played with soft hands as he opens the face
good pace, good carry and a leave outside off stump ends the over...TV speed gun had that at 91mph
nice shot, whipped off middle stump and it races through square leg...far too straight from Bresnan
better length from Bresnan, Rahane drops it by his feet and there's some excellent running as Gambhir sprints through
more good running, dropped into the covers and they make it comfortably
top edge! And it carries all the way, just has the legs to clear long leg. He wasn't in complete control of the hook but it flew off the bat
got him this time! The short ball works, Bresnan sends down another bouncer and Rahane's hook only carries as far as Dernbach at long leg who takes it well. Bresnan is pumped up
full on off stump, defended into the leg side
opens the face down to third man
drags this one short and wide outside off
that's better from Finn, fuller on off stump, defended back to the bowler
defended square on the off side
finds the edge, it falls short of Swann at second slip who can't stop it with one hand...Finn not entirely impressed
good follow-up from Finn, beats the outside edge as Kohli comes forward
that's a ripper! Climbs off a good length and beats the outside edge again. Lively stuff on a pitch offering a little bit of help
full on middle, worked into the leg side, Bresnan is quickly onto it
nicely timed square of the wicket off the back foot but straight to point
ooh, that didn't come out right and Bresnan has tumbled over in the crease sending down a big wide
back on the spot, full on middle and off, defended coming forward
whipped off middle stump through midwicket but mid-on cuts it off
defended into the off side although Kohli's manner suggests he didn't think it bounced that much
too straight from Bresnan and neatly flicked away through square leg to keep India ticking over
lucky! Goes for a booming drive and gets an inside edge past the stumps to fine leg
the pace is still very good, Gambhir defends to midwicket
another edge! Beats third slip (it wasn't a catch) and also beats a diving third man...played with soft hands, so credit to the batsman
another boundary, Finn went for very full and Gambhir picks him off through the vacant leg-side area
drags the length, back on off stump, defended back towards the bowler
another edge! And again it falls short of third slip, but only just this time and it's actually a good stop
Dernbach is full and straight to start, Kohli shuffling across to turn him through midwicket
Dernbach digs one in short but the ball hardly gets up off the placid pitch, and Gambhir cracks a pull out into the deep
pitched up with just a hint of shape away from the right-hander, who comes forward to defend watchfully to leg
placed with plenty of wrist into the leg side ... They decide against a second run
Gambhir hops at the crease to defend a back-of-a-length delivery back down the pitch
slanted across the left-handed Gambhir, who slashes down at the ball to send it bouncing away to third man
does this keep a bit low? Gambhir stepped back and tried to cut but could only bottom edge it straight into the ground
aggression from Gambhir! He doesn't want to let Swann settle, and charges down the track at the offspinner. He's not quite to the pitch of it, however, and can only drill the ball at mid-on
tapped defensively to point

this almost got away from Gambhir! He used his feet again but the ball floated wide of him, spinning further away, and he really had to reach for it. He ended up slicing the drive uppishly, but into no-man's land
nudged through cover point. The call for a single is a little late, but there's time to sprint through
Kohli comes forward to work one through mid-on, playing with the spin
edged, but the ball flies through the vacant second/third slip area! Dernbach really bent his back to extract some life from the pitch and a tentative Kohli didn't move his feet at all
Dernbach tries to get one up into Kohli's ribs, but the batsman swivels back to pull down to fine leg, keeping it down
another rising delivery from the tattooed fast bowler, and Gambhir hops to ride the bounce and play it down to gully
Dernbach switches to round the wicket, and Gambhir glides one down to third man
what a riposte from the batsman! Another short-ish delivery from Dernbach, and it's spanked to deep midwicket with flair and power
a pacy delivery from Dernbach, but it's easily worked away for one
flicked with the spin down to fine leg. Swann's finding reasonable grip off the surface
tossed up nice and full from round the wicket, Gambhir driving back to the bowler
width offered outside off, but it's just the single as Gambhir hammers the ball out to the cover sweeper
Virat flicks off the toes, and beats a diving midwicket fielder to pick up a single
perfect placement! Gambhir picked up the short length and the width in a flash, stepping back and playing a deft late cut that had the beating of the man at short third man
Gambhir comes forward to defend to cover
decent start from Bopara, and he's watchfull played by Kohli
landing on a length outside off. Kohli stays deep in the crease to punch to cover
a slower ball gone wrong from Bopara, and it's speared down the leg side
eased out to long on, Kohli playing with a straight bat and a high left elbow
Bopara switches to round the wicket for Gambhir, but the left-hander works with the angle to pick up a single through square leg
this fairly pinged out of the middle! It was Ravi's effort ball, but again it was too straight and Kohli turned his wrists over it to send it bouncing down to the fine leg boundary
that's a much better length from the medium-pacer, drawing the batsman forward. Kohli lunged into a defensive shot, the ball taking a thick inside edge
turn and bounce for the offspinner! This gripped and spat off the surface, leaping past the shoulder of Gambhir's bat
some fizz off the surface once more, but this ball doesn't land as well and Gambhir rocks back to punch through cover point
Kohli stretches well forward in defence, the ball spinning in to him and coming off the pad, a leg bye taken
driven softly to extra cover
Gambhir comes forward once again to push to cover, but hits the fielder

all sorts of appeals going on! Gambhir came forward to what looked like the arm ball, and Swann seemed to think it had hit the pad first. But no, that's off the face of the bat. Then, there's an appeal for a run out as they hustle a quick single, but the replay shows Kohli safely home
slipping towards the leg side, and Gambhir taps him safely through square leg
silky! Bopara invited the shot by pitching up outside off, but Kohli took full toll, threading the gap in the covers with a technically-pure checked drive. A pleasure to see
not quite full enough to repeat the stroke, and Kohli defends
flapped down to long on for one
slippery delivery from Bopara! He speared down the surprise yorker, and Gambhir was a little late in keeping it out
and a length delivery is defended right under the nose to end the over
Dernbach is a little short of a good length to start, and Kohli stands at the crease to flick off the hip
a clubbed cut is intercepted at cover point by Bresnan, I believe
angled down to third man for an undramatic single
turned off the pads for one
the slower one from Dernbach. It looked like the back-of-the-hand delivery. Gambhir places it through cover for one
whipped nicely off a leg stump line ... It appeared that a second run might be on as the ball rolled out to long leg, but they decide against it
on a length and straight to start - a good loosener - and Kohli nudges him watchfully into the leg side
good wheels from Finn, but the placement is not great, the ball flying down the leg side to be called wide

shot! Kohli's timing has been spot on tonight. Finn attacked the stumps with a full delivery but Kohli sent it rocketing back past him with a straight bat. Not quite Sibanda-esque in its quality, but a great shot all the same
the ball is slung down on a full length once again, and a little outside off stump. Kohli taps to extra cover
Finn is keeping the ball right up to the bat here. This one is dug out off the toes and into the leg side, in front of midwicket
a probing delivery on middle and off is kept out with a seemingly watertight defence
punched out through cover for one
a pacy delivery from Dernbach is chopped down to third man
Dernbach aims two-thirds of the way up middle, and Kohli nurdles him cautiously to midwicket
flicked to midwicket with rather more intent this time, but a diving Bopara cuts it off cleanly. Dernbach appreciates the effort
Kohli turns the face of the bat sharply to glance a length delivery down to fine leg
some variety of slower delivery from Dernbach, who comes round the wicket to Gambhir, but it's well picked and cracked to a tumbling Bairstow at backward point. Just the single
whipped down to fine leg, another run to the total
full on the stumps, driven square on the off side
played into the off side
uses his feet then flays this over the slips down to third man...safe shot when played with so much powr
worked into the leg side
back of a length, opens the face and beats backward point, easily done
more lovely timing from Kohli, threads the gap between cover and point, but Bopara does well to claw the ball back
flicked from outside off along the ground to midwicket where Bairstow makes a good save
the non-striker might have saved a run there, it was flicked down the pitch and Gambhir deflected it into the stumps
misfield at midwicket by Bairstow - that won't impress Swann - as he kicks this away to square leg
tucked behind square on the leg side
turned from outside off out to deep square
that's a top shot, uses his feet and dances down outside leg stump then drives inside out over cover...wonderful batting
round the wicket, driven to cover
too short, Kohli waits on the back foot and drives to deep cover to reach an excellent fifty
chopped down to short third man
nice footwork then chips this down to long on...brings up the hundred stand
eased down the ground, no pressure on India now
short outside off again, driven with nice placement wide of the cover sweeper
beats the outside edge with one that doesn't turn. Kieswetter appeals for a stumping but the back foot hadn't moved
worked down the ground to long on
nicely bowled, curves in a little to Gambhir who defends down to silly point
worked off the back foot into square leg and now Gambhir has fifty as well. He a had a tough tour of England but's a very fine player
another easy run down the ground
tossed up very full, Gambhir opens his stance which allows him to drive to deep cover
still too short from Patel, cut away through backward point and a size 12 on the boundary prevents the boundary
flicked out to midwicket
he's helping himself now, poor bowling from Patel, too much width outside off and Gambhir dabs it through short third man
now he uses his feets and works this through the leg side
elegance, timing and placement...driven through the covers by a player who's in wonderful form
pushed back to Patel who fumbles off his own bowling and gives away a single
uses his wrists and takes this from outside off through the leg side
on middle and defended
goes for a sweep and almost gets a toe-end to midwicket but it falls safe
shuffles onto the back foot and dabs it away from leg stump to fine leg
sweetly timed off the back foot but straight to cover
poor line down the leg side, sums things up for England, and Swann spins on his heels after sending that down
big appeal for lbw as Kohli tries to work across the line but it looked outside off stump
excellent running, dropped down by his feet...Bairstow races in, hits direct then crashes over the stumps to demolish them
driven off the back foot to cover
his timing has been superb throughout and that's another one...driven through the off side with not much more than a push.
flicked down to mid-on
comes across the stumps and takes this from outside off to the leg side
dragged down short and Gambhir pulls it easily through square leg
easily flicked off the stumps through square leg
can't beat midwicket as he punches off the back foot
that's pure class. It was tossed up on off stump and Kohli slotted it wide of mid-off with the perfect drive
driven off the back foot and finds cover
comes round the wicket, on leg stump, worked to deep square
the wheels are off. Gambhir dabs this square on the off side and Finn makes a hash of the fielding. Swann close to exploding
tossed up outside off, sweetly driven and well fielded at cover
round the wicket, on middle, defended
on the stumps, pushed in the covers
pushed towards leg stump and bobbles off the pad
low full toss outside off and that's easy pickings as it's slotted through the covers
tucked into square leg...more milking on show than a cow shed
defended to the off side
well bowled, beaten outside off, Finn has been impressive despite his figures
good length outside off, Kohli defends and India can see out Finn if they want
lovely timing through midwicket, just a flick, and deep square does the fielding
worked to deep square-leg
driven up to mid-off who is too deep to stop the single
speared down the leg side, Gambhir keeps his back leg grounded and a wide is called
tapped down through gully for one
Kohli follows suit, in mirror image, with a late cut to short third man
Gambhir steps away, exposing his stumps, and punches one to cover point
Kohli stretches his left leg well down the wicket and across to the off side, fetching the ball across to deep midwicket. Well-timed
sliced down behind point for one. India are simply cruising
KP comes round the wicket to Kohli, who hangs deep in the crease and shovels him to midwicket
nudged off the hip, another single taken
worked through cover for one
some spice from Finn! He steams in and slams one down on a good length, the delivery rising and whistling past Kohli's grille
a touch fuller from Finn, and Kohli stays still at the crease in defence
elegantly flicked off the pad and down to long leg
nicely full from Finn, Gambhir defends
a slow cutter is nailed firmly to cover, where it's stopped by the fielder
shot! Sublime timing from Kohli, who whips off the pad with minimum fuss and beats a diving Samit Patel at midwicket. That takes India past 200, and Kohli's looking good for a ton now
not quite as straight from Bopara, and Kohli pushes back to the bowler
horrid delivery. Lobbed way down the leg side, a huge wide
glanced to midwicket, this time he hits it straight at Samit and there are no runs to be had
eased out through the leg side, the fielder running listlessly in to hurl the ball back
good grief. Another huge wide from Ravi, on the off side this time
Gambhir finds a single with a glide to third man
deft touch from Gambhir! Again Samit is the man beaten, at third man this time, but there's not much he could have done about it. Gambhir placed the ball superbly with a late cut
punched into the off side for a single
Kohli is one hit away from the ton now! Another super shot from him takes him to 94, the batsman stepping away to slap an offspinner disdainfully through extra cover
this time he lunges forward to flick to midwicket, but finds a fielder
turned with the spin to short fine leg
quiet defence from Gambhir to end the over
Kohli meets Dernbach's first delivery with a firm front-foot defence
put away without fanfair. Kohli goes to 99 with yet another of those sumptuous checked cover drives. The ball raced through the gap and unhindered to the boundary
slammed down halfway down the pitch, called wide as it balloons down the leg side

there it is! A seventh ODI century for Kohli, and he reaches the mark with a neat little tuck to leg. Off comes the helmet, up go the fists. His team-mates rise on the balcony to applaud his effort, and there's a huge roar in the stadium
Gambhir turns one off his thigh, and they're back for the second
for the umpteenth time Gambhir runs a bowler down to third man for an easy single
a slower ball is glanced to fine leg, where it's stopped by the fielder
his loosener lands straight and on a length, and is pushed defensively to leg
heaved over the top, and dropped by Trott at deep midwicket! He ran forward but didn't get into a good position, trying to take the ball low and letting it through his finger tips
another dab to third man, another single
a slower ball, pitched up outside off, is slapped hard to cover
shot! On a length and wide from Bresnan, and Kohli sends it sailing over extra cover with a sliced drive, on the up. The shot of a man with total confidence in his own abilities
nudged away for another single, just six needed by India now
punched through straight mid-on, he can't quite beat the fielder
a Dernbach slower ball is slugged out to deep midwicket, albeit without much timing
Dernbach aims for the yorker, but it's dug out wide of mid-on and they scurry through for a quick single
there's the game! Another leg-side slug from Kohli, but this one is out of the middle and races to the deep midwicket boundary
